smg.text: Mainly fine. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Temperature falling. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. A few light rain patches. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Temperature falling slightly. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Temperature falling. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 5 northerly winds with gusts.
Dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
